thread.title: Iowa Senate committee approves Planned Parenthood funding ban
thread.title_full: Iowa Senate committee approves Planned Parenthood funding ban

title: Iowa Senate committee approves Planned Parenthood funding ban
text:
Iowa Senate committee approves Planned Parenthood funding ban posted by Gary Barrett - share 
Protesters outnumbered legislators and lobbyists today as the Iowa Senate Judiciary Committee considered a bill that would ban Medicaid funding for Planned Parenthood. 
Governor Branstad proposed the ban in his Condition of the State message, and Senate Republicans followed through Tuesday by sending a bill to the full Senate for debate. Democrats on the committee voted against the measure. 
Senate File 2 bars state Medicaid funds for any organization that offers abortions. It also sets the priority for state family planning funds to state, county or local health clinics, along with non public organizations that provide healthcare. Organizations like Planned Parenthood that refer Iowans to other health care providers would be last in priority. 
Hundreds of protesters from both sides were on hand in the rotunda of the state capitol outside the meeting room where the committee was scheduled to meet. 
Democrats have said they'll fight against the legislation. Republicans are promising to pass the legislation in some form this year.
